    • Method Detail

      • findOffersFiltered

        List<OfferEntity> findOffersFiltered(OfferFilter offerFilterBo,
                                   OfferSortBy sortBy)
        Returns a List of filtered OfferEntitys.
        Parameters:
        offerFilterBo - is the offers filter criteria. Any value, that should be applied as a filter, have to be different to null.
        sortBy - is the OfferSortBy attribute, which defines the sorting.
        Returns:
        the List with all OfferEntitys that match the offers filter criteria.
